name: 100 Years of Women - Emily Faye x Bstract

metadata.name: Age 1 - 100 Years of Women
metadata.description:
100 Years of Women

100 Songs each with 1/1 animated visual art and unique utilities.

Emily Faye is a UK country/pop artist, who has written 100 songs to be minted as an NFT collection. Each NFT will come with an original animated piece of Art created by Bstract and will also provide future utility

Lyrics

Ten tiny fingers ten tiny toes  
It's true what they say About how fast they grow  
This time last year they brought you home  
And time passes by like it’s nothing at all  
You’ve learnt how to clap You’ve learnt how to smile  
Now you can sit up, and crawl In your very own style  
We’ve seen a new world through those little eyes  
wrapped you in up our arms over a thousand times
